Maria Lopez.description: waking up and completing her morning routine (conversing about their shared participation in the Love Ville program, expressing enthusiasm and agreement, as they make plans to meet at the Hobb Cafe at 10:30 to grab coffee, share pastries, and play a flavor-guessing game, with Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller engaging in a lively and playful exchange, making a deal that the loser of the game will not only buy the next round of coffee but also share an embarrassing story about themselves.) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cafe customer seating
